question: What is the full form of CITES?
option1: Convention on Intermittent Trade in Endangered Species
option2: Conference on International Trade in Endangered Species
option3: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species
answer: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species
explanation: CITES stands for Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species, which is an international agreement amongst countries to protect wild flora and fauna all over the world. It came into effect on 1 July 1975.
